channel.title: Batched mining
channel.description: How do I code so that different pickaxes automatically re-attempt a swing. Using noobscape source. I am beginner java user and am having troubles with this. looking to have iron retry once, steel 2 ,mith 4, addy 6, rune until you get ore.

item.title: Batched mining
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

final int attempts = 5;//How many attempts
World.getWorld().getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedEvent(player, 1200) {
	int retryCount = 0;
	public void run() {
/* Mining code here. */
		if(retryCount++ >= attempts) {
			running = false;
		}
	}
});

Something like that.

Read full topic
